TCutility v0.15.5 documentation#

TCutility is a Python library containing many helper functions and classes for use in programs written in the TheoCheM group.

Main modules

  • tcutility.results
    • Overview
    • Available keys present in the Result object
      • ADF calculation
  • tcutility.job
    • Overview
      • Job classes
      • Slurm support
      • Job dependencies
      • Rerun prevention
      • Supported engines
    • Requirements
    • Examples
      • Geometry optimization using ADF
      • Fragment calculation using ADF
  • tcutility.analysis
    • Transition State Analysis module
    • VDD Charge Analysis module
      • Requirements
      • Example
      • VDD analysis API
  • Command-line interface (CLI) scripts
    • Overview

Utility modules

  • tcutility.data package
    • Submodules
    • tcutility.data.atom module
    • tcutility.data.basis_sets module
    • tcutility.data.cosmo module
    • tcutility.data.functionals module
    • tcutility.data.molecules module
    • Module contents
  • tcutility.report package
    • Submodules
    • tcutility.report.character module
    • tcutility.report.figure_resizer module
    • Module contents

Full API

  • tcutility
    • tcutility package

Note

This library is under heavy development, so there are no guarantees that older code will work with newer versions.
